quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an life changing round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First, it would be good if you could go to the north. With that done, venture north. And then, venture east. Then, move south. And then, make an attempt to go to the east. After that, venture south. And then, head south. With that over with, attempt to move east. Then, recover the printer from the stand. Then, put the printer on the mantelpiece. That's it!

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A typical one.

 You make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if] You can see a stand. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a stand? The stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_1]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've entered a dish-pit. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You make out a plate. The plate is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the plate you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the office. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a sauna. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A normal one. Let's see what's in here.

 You can make out a box. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0], so there's that.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out an armchair. [if there is something on the s_3]On the armchair you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The armchair appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the cubicle.

 You see a table. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the table. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a washroom. An ordinary one. You begin looking for stuff.



There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You're now in a chamber.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Ah, the canteen. This is some kind of canteen, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. You begin looking for stuff.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've entered a workshop.

 You can make out a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a spare room. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchenette. You begin looking for stuff.

 Look over there! a pan. [if there is something on the s_6]On the pan you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The pan appears to be empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
I am so happy to announce that you are now in the bedchamber. The room is well lit.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a shower.

 You see a spherical chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The spherical chest contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Were you looking for a counter? Because look over there, it's a counter. The counter is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the counter! oh well.[end if] You can make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_8]On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a laundromat.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. An ordinary kind of place.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] Look over there! a type 5 chest.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The type 5 chest contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type 5 chest is empty![end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a workbench. [if there is something on the s_9]You see [a list of things on the s_9] on the workbench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A typical kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
I just think it's awesome that you're in a garage now.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a steam room. A normal one. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The basket is empty![end if] You can see a drawer.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_6]. Is this what you came to TextWorld for? This... drawer?[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a TextWorld style safe.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The TextWorld style safe contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The TextWorld style safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a rack. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. An usual one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 Look over there! a Microsoft style chest.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The Microsoft style chest contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The Microsoft style chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to attempt to head north. That done, try to go to the north. With that over with, go to the east. And then, travel south. After that, make an attempt to go to the east. After that, go south. Following that, attempt to go south. And then, go to the east. And then, retrieve the printer from the stand within the study. After that, place the printer on the mantelpiece within the study. Got that? Good!
